presets.content: Ke kitaabe dabari ti do ke leminanxaranfedde kapalenmon deemanden saabu danŋa ya ken ga ni “All Children Reading: A Grand Challenge for Development (ACR GCD)”: Ameriki golliranka be ga sikki do dagakaanen ŋa duna noxo [USAID], Vision Mondial do jamaane Osutarali a do kitaabinfedde “Global Book Alliance”. SIL LEAD, Inc. yan da golle ke dabari, xa ku kapanlenkafonu ACR GCD do kitaabinfedde Global Book Alliance sinmayun feti. Sere su nda ke kitaabe yilla ti a moxonma su ya, kafo ACR GCD fo yillante feti, a do xa juumeyu beenu nda wari a noxon di, kafo ke batte feti.
